summary.span: 允许由代码组的策略声明和第一个匹配的子代码组的策略声明的联合来定义安全策略。

span.span: Allows security policy to be defined by the union of the policy statement of a code group and that of the first child code group that matches.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是代码访问安全策略的构建基块。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别都包含一个可以具有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组都可以有自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展为任意数目的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组都有一个成员条件，确定给定程序集是否属于该程序集的证据。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 只有其成员条件与给定程序集匹配的代码组及其子代码组才会应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 与任何代码组一样， 仅当其成员条件与程序集的证据匹配时才适用。Like any code group, only applies when its membership condition matches evidence for an assembly. 如果存在匹配项，它将按顺序测试每个子项的成员资格条件，并在第一次匹配发生时停止。If there is a match, it tests the membership condition of each child in order, stopping when the first match occurs. 的结果 是根代码组的策略声明与该代码组中匹配的第一个子组的策略声明的联合。The result of is the union of the policy statement of the root code group and the policy statement of the first child group of that code group that matches. 适用于应用程序域主机以编程方式设置域策略。 is intended for programmatic use by application domain hosts to set domain policy. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类的成员 。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成员条件，它测试证据以确定此代码组是否应用策略。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 形式为权限集和特性的代码组的策略声明，这些权限集和特性将被授予匹配成员条件的代码。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个基本代码组，并应从自定义代码组的构造函数中调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 可以使用方法添加子代码组 。Child code groups can be added using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. span.span: An equivalent copy of the code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会创建代码组的深层副本，这意味着还会创建它包含的所有对象的副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, meaning that copies of all objects it contains are made, as well. ## Examples 下面的代码演示 如何使用方法创建代码组的深层副本。The following code shows the use of method to make a deep copy of the code group. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Resolve (evidence As Evidence) As PolicyStatement

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 对一组证据解析代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的策略声明；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要加载的程序集，此方法通过首先检查针对指定证据的成员资格条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果存在匹配项，则此方法返回代码组的策略声明，包括子代码组的计算。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于第一个匹配的代码组，将按照添加顺序对证据测试每个子代码组的成员条件;仅将第一个匹配项解析为证据集。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果没有匹配项，则应用父级第一个匹配代码组的策略声明。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 匹配的子代码组类型确定如何应用其下的所有子组，具体取决于 这些子组的方法的工作方式。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全系统将 在策略级别上使用，以确定要从生成的策略语句和程序集上的代码请求中授予加载的代码的权限。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 此方法的操作如下所示：This operation of this method is as follows: 如果成员条件与指定的证据不匹配，则返回 `null` ; 否则，将返回的权限集 (P) 等于代码组的策略语句并继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue. 对于每个子代码组，请解析具有相同证据的代码组;如果结果不为 `null` ，则返回该策略语句。For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement. 如果没有匹配的子代码组，则返回 P (父的 policy 语句) 。If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement). ## Examples 下面的代码演示 如何使用方法来解析代码组的策略。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ResolveMatchingCodeGroups (evidence As Evidence) As CodeGroup

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是匹配代码组的树的根。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要加载的程序集，此方法通过首先检查针对指定证据的成员资格条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果有匹配项，则此方法返回一个根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组包含子代码组，这些子代码组反过来也可以有必要的子代码组，以反映与所提供的证据相匹配的完整代码组集。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. 对于第一个匹配的代码组，将按照添加顺序对证据测试每个子代码组的成员条件;仅将第一个匹配项解析为证据集。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果没有匹配项，则应用父级第一个匹配代码组的策略声明。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 匹配的子代码组类型确定如何应用其下的所有子组，具体取决于 这些子组的方法的工作方式。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. ## Examples 下面的代码演示 如何使用方法解析匹配的代码组。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
